title: Specialty Industrial Cabling - Chemical Plant
scope_excerpt:
Requirement for specialized fire-resistant cables.
Item 1: 1.1kV 4x25mm2 Fire Resistant Cable, Mica Tape, LSZH Sheath. Quantity: 2000m. 
Item 2: Custom 66kV Submarine Cable, Double Armored. Quantity: 500m. (Note: Non-standard item). 
Item 3: 11kV 3x185mm2 XLPE Cable, Aluminum. Quantity: 1500m.
